item.title: How Modern Web Applications Are Built in 2025
item.description: Modern web applications focus on performance, maintainability, and scalability. The technology ecosystem changes rapidly, but the core principles remain consistent: build fast, secure, and user-friendly systems.

item.title: Data Engineering Essentials for Scalable Applications
item.description: Data engineering ties software systems together. Without clean, consistent data, even the best applications fail to deliver reliable results.

item.title: Creating User-Friendly Interfaces with Modern Design Systems
item.description: A well-designed interface makes a product feel effortless to use. Modern design systems help teams create consistent and accessible experiences across platforms.

item.title: Deploying Applications to the Cloud in 2025
item.description: Cloud deployment has evolved into an automated, predictable process. With containerization and CI/CD pipelines, teams can deliver updates faster than ever.

item.title: Lecture 1: Polyrepo Architectures
item.description:
DeepRoot Architecture

This content is injected from the private repo into the flattened engine.
